1.content: Are you a boy or a girl?
1.title: Starting the story

choices: Next to a large Japanese architecture (The Hakurei shine)
In the middle of a humongus forest (Forest Of Magic)
On a endless hallway (Scarlet Devil Mansion)
11.content:
"Ugghh...my head" you groaned after you woken up and got up from a long state of unconsciousness. You remembered that you were walking down the street when suddenly, you come across a odd portal in the bushes. The portal was purple with creepy eyes inside and red ribbons on each side. After curiously approaching it, you were suddenly sucked in quickly and soon, you blacked out.

The real question remains, where are you right now?
11.title: Into the unknown...

choices: You hear someone coming this way
111.content:
You found youself in a patch of grass that all towered over you. "Wait hold on, why the hell I'm I so small?" you asked yourself as you can already tell that by just looking at these plants. You don't know where you are exactly since this place feels so unfamiliar. You navigate yourself across the grass to find out where you are.

Suddenly, you saw something huge above you. Unfortunately you can barely see what it is due to the grass blades blocking your view but you could see that it's some sort of red structure. While you tried to find a suitable spot to view this thing, you soon found yourself in a stone path. Not only you got out of the grass, but you could also see what it was.

"I don't believe this..." you said in disbelief. Right above you was an humongus torii standing at several feet (at least to you) from the ground. From what you learn about Japan, a torii is a type of structure that serves as a gateway to the Shinto shrine; acting like a transition between the mortal and spirit world in Shinto religion. You were surprised to see something like this in front of your eyes which cause you to think that you were in a gigantic version of Japan. You look ahead to see what looks like a Shinto shrine so maybe you could go and find help. Unfortunately, you have no idea if they could understand you since you are in Japan. Of course, that won't mean you could stay here any longer.

What will you do?
111.title: Shinto Shrine

choices: An old-looking brown house with vines around it
A white house that looked quite clean
A house that resembles a tall tree
112.content:
You were in a middle of a strange-looking forest and by the looks of it, the forest absolutely HUGE! However you realized that by looking at a tall flower next to you, you realized that you were absolutely tiny here. You don't know how the heck this happened, but you know you're going to need to find a safe place in order to survive.

You look around this forest for some place to be safe and possibly someone for help. Even at normal-size, you could still get easily lost in here. You trek forward to what looks like a clearing; thinking there might be something there.

Thankfully, it didn't took too long to get there (although you were forced to venture within the bushes under the trees) as you stepped onto the clearing. "Alright, let's see what's ahead." you said to yourself and look ahead.

What did you see?
112.title: Magical Forest

choices: She looks at the ground; did she see you?
1121.content:
It was a rather old-fashioned home that was brown in color and has vines covering it. You wonder who could live in place like this especially in the middle of nowhere. You make your way up to the house in hopes of trying to get help. "I know by this size, they probably wouldn't see me but I have to risk it." You said as you go.

As if life heard your plea, the door of the house opens and comes out someone. That's good, you wouldn't have to go inside and find someone there. You try to get a good look at who was the owner of the house.

The owner appears to be a young lady who resembles a witch of some sort. She has long blond hair that was covered by a stereotypical witch hat, a black and white buttoned-up dress with puffy sleeves, and black mary-jane shoes. Looking at her, you now know why there's a house in a forest. You know that witches tend to live far away from society and often in wooded areas like this so it made sense. What you don't know however is that if she's friendly or not. Witches can be either good or bad so you hope that she'll be nice enough to use her magic to turn you back to normal-size unless she has that kind of power.

You watch as the witch carries a broomstick on her hand and say "Alright, it's time for me to go." You realized that she's going somewhere else and is going to leave you behind. You could try to go and hitch a ride on her broom to get her attention along the way, but that's too dangerous. You may try to go and wait inside her house til she comes back, but you don't know how long will it take.

What will you do?
1121.title: The Witch's Home

choices: The witch felt you on her shoe
11211.content:
You weren't much of a risk taker; all you wanted to do was to get help as fast as you can. So with that, you start to run towards the giant witch in hopes that you were fast enough to grab onto her before she flies off. Somewhat lucky, the witch starts to run herself to catch some speed in order to use the broom. This could be dangerous because you could get stepped on by her shoe, but you went on anyways.

When you finally made it, you make a running leap of faith while having your eyes shut at the moment you made your jump. You have your arms opened wide to catch and grab on to something.

"AHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!"

Did you made it?

Your arms have made contact on something smooth, but at the same time you felt yourself hovering in the air. You slowly opened your eyes to find yourself clinged to this witch's shoe while she flies through the sky on her broom. You look down and realized how high up you really are from the ground and it's almost making you sick just looking at it.

You need to go somewhere safe during the ride. You could try to climb up higher or try to go inside her shoe for shelter.

What happens next?
11211.title: A Ride With Marisa

choices: The door opens and someone comes out
1122.content:
It was a rather nice looking house that was white in color. For being in a middle of a forest, it was surprisingly clean; no vines or anything like that. The house itself was pretty small by the looks of it, but there's a small tower next to it which could be where the bedroom is located. "I bet someone could help me." You said and make your way to the house. You still don't know who even lives there but you hope that they're friendly enough to help you.

You got to the house after a long walk that almost made your legs sore. You stood below the door which towered over you, making you nervous of how small you really are compared to whoever lives here. You obliviously can't knock on the door at this size, but you could at least you could try to slip beneath the door. "It's a little painful, but I know I could do this." You said.

What happen next?
1122.title: A Clean Home

113.content:
You were totally confused at where you are at the moment. Your whole surroundings was completely red, almost the color of blood which to be honest, scared you a bit. You were standing on the middle of an enormous hallway that went on for who knows how long. The whole place reminds you of some sort of mansion as everything around here was luxurious....for something that was painted blood red. However, what really got your attention was a nearby table that towered over you, making you feel like an insect around here.

You wander forward in hopes you find some help around here or maybe some shelter around here. You don't know much about this place. All you could know was a clue in form of a painting which features a young girl with blue hair and scarlet eyes which was a little bit unsettling to you. Unfortunately, you couldn't see what's outside due to your size but you can tell that it was slowly getting dark.

Finally, you found a large door that must've lead to a room of some sort. Just to be careful, you take a peak of the outside and see were does it lead.

What did you see?
113.title: Vampire Lair

1131.content:
you were now in the grand bed room. You didn`t know who sleeps here until you hear a loud yawning noise. You looked up and saw a blue haired girl with red eyes that you saw in the picture. You noticed that she was in her pajamas and you wondered if you would
notice her until within blink of the second a maid with grey hair came.

"It's time for you to wake up my lady” said the maid.

"Yeah, I know." The girl replied.

You saw her change clothes and within 5 minutes, she changed her clothes. You were still wondering if you should let her know until the girl noticed you.

"Well, well, what do we have here?" She said.

She picked you up and she smiled. Her fang showed your fear, she noticed and chuckled.

"So you have to see me change, the famous Remilia Scarlet? You have some nerve." She said.

"I'm sorry! It was an accident” You repiled.

　
"I think I shall...
1131.title: vampires room

11311.content:
“I think I shall eat you.” Remilia said.

“Wait, no,please!” You pleaded.

But with no hesitation, she tossed you high and when you fell you saw her mouth open. You feared as she got you, she tasted you for moment as the tongue were pushing you to left and right, then swallowed you. You felt her esophagus pushing you down and within moment the esophagus pushed you down into her stomach. You looked around, as the fleshy wall were moving little and making churning noise.

‘I hope he was my good morning snack’ voice spoke.

‘I hope it did.’ Another voice spoke.

You felt some and started to pound on her stomach walls, only to bounce you to the floor.

Just then, the stomach acid came down. You felt it and it burned your skin, and...
11311.title: Into her belly

choices: You are forced to be Flandre's plaything
You are locked in a storage room
11312.content:
Remilia looks at you and say "I can't think what to do with you, maybe Sakuya knows what to do with you."

"Yes, my lady Remilia. I'll do something about this intruder." said the maid and approaches you.

You don't know what to do, but you know that you can't stand here. With that, you try to run and jump off of Remilia's hand. However, your vision suddenly when blank and then you hit a glass wall that appears in front of you; out of nowhere. You look up and saw that you are standing on Sakuya's hand instead. You also realized that you're imprisoned inside a glass jar.

"Sorry little guy, but there's no way you can't escape my time-stopping powers." said Sakuya. It seems that she knew your attempts to escape and stops time itself to catch you in time. "Let's go and give you a punishment for peeking on the mistress herself."

From inside the jar, Sakuya walks from the bedroom and into the hallway.

What is your punishment?
11312.title: Within Sakuya's Grasp

1132.content:
You saw what looks like a library; a very huge one indeed. No seriously if you were the same size as anyone around here, it'll still be as gigantic as you can expect. From this point, all you could see were the bottom part of the shelves and by this size, it'll probably take hours to reach the wall. Despite the size of the library, you decided to go there and seek someone for help or somewhere to hide. You slip underneath the door and into the enormous library.

Going to this library is like entering a large city. All the shelves towered over you like skyscrapers and floor was the streets that spread among the buildings. You walk forwards through the center space of the two shelves and can't help but feel impressed by how many books are around here. You bet that many librarians everywhere would be pretty jealous if they got wrap here and see tons of books, the structure and design, and the size of this library.

You went onward until you found youself in a clearing. Right in the center, you saw a large table full of books. That's not all you see there, you also saw someone sitting there and reading one of the books; finally you saw someone in this giant mansion.

She appears to be a young lady with long purple hair that was tied in red and blue ribbons and matching eyes. She wears a long lavender night dress and a small bonnet with a crescent moon on top. Right now, she's reading something but you aren't interested on that at the moment.

You were about to approach her when suddenly from far behind, you saw another giant girl, but this one was far more unusual than the other one. How can you tell? Well, she was in fact flying by flapping her large bat-like wings.

She has long red hair and on her head, you can make out a pair of mini-wings much like her main ones. She wears a black dress with white sleeves and a red bowtie. She has a pair of gray tights and black shoes. Just by looking at here, you can tell that she isn't human. In her arms, she's carrying books and putting them in the shelves. You guess that she's one of workers in this library.

After looking at them, you think about getting their attention or just look somewhere to hide.

What do you choose?
1132.title: Library City

choices: On a brown surface with a wide purple arch above you (on Seija Kijin's sandal)
On a red surface that curves outwards all around you (in Hoshiguma's sake dish)
115.content: You finally wake up after blacking out and you try to look around at your new location. At first it's difficult since you are regaining your sight but after a few seconds you are able to see. But you don't know where you are and you see you are located...
115.title: Other places

choices: No, you go into her mouth
1151.content:
You felt the hard floor and noticed it was a wooden floor. You don't even remember walking on the wooden floor until you felt something looming over you. It was purple arch and you were very shocked to see this, and looked around, realizing that you were shrunk down!

"Wha..what happened to me!?" You spoke with fear.

Then the ground started to shake and you turned around and saw a giant female walking toward you! The female had mid-long black hair, a white dress with arrows pointing in opposite sides. You then also noticed that the female had a horn on her forehead!

"Hehehe! I shall pull another clever pranks on those stupid mortals!!" Female spoke with grin.

She now overloomed you and was about to put the sandel in until she noticed you. You were both surprised and fearful to see a real life giantess before you.


"Huh? A human? A TINY mortal human?" Female spoke.

"Who..who're..!!"

Before you could speak more, the female picked you up and rose you up to her eyesight. Her red eyes looked at you closely as she observed you, she grinned and laughed hard as you could easily see she's no ordinary person.

"This is just amazing!! I caught an inchling, just like that princess!" Female said.

"Um..who are..you?" You asked.

She stopped laughing and looked at you.

"You don't know me? I am Kijin Seiga, an amanojyaku!" She answered.

You shivered as you never seen or heared this person before. You felt that she might do something bad and wanted to escape, but because she still holding you on, escape was not an option. You then heard seijas belly grumble and you immediately noticed her licking her lips.

"You know? We youkais do have some taste for human flesh...maybe you can ease my hunger." Seija spoke.

"What!? No! Don't!!" You screamed.

"Sorry little inchling, strong eats the weak." Seija spoke.

She lifted you up in the sky and you saw her mouth open wide. You screamed for help, but did it work?
1151.title: Greetings from amanojaku

11511.content:
You can only watch as her mouth gets closer and you try to release yourself from her grip, but this only made her hand squeeze you harder to prevent you from escape.

"Stop squirmming you weak little inchling, you know that yokais like myself eat humans like yourself." said Seija "Now time to meet my stomach."

It's already over, your life will end right here. You didn't even get a chance of having an successful life because some portal just sucked you here to who knows where. You closed your eyes and get ready for your incoming fate.

"Hey Seija are you here? I hope you're not hungry because I just made dinner."

Seija stops what she's doing and look back to where the voice is coming from.

"But I already have a piece of food in my hand; I can't let it go to waste." She replied back.

"What?"

Suddenly, you see a floating black bowl that came from the door. You didn't even notice at first until you saw a small girl riding inside of it. She has purple hair and wears a pink kimono with a black strap around it. By the looks of it, she appears to be the size of a doll, but you are still much smaller than her.

"Are you saying that you already got food for yourself?" She asked.

"That's right Sukuna, I just found this little human on my sandal and I already planning to eat him." said Seija.

Sukuna then floated towards you and looks at you.

"Can you please tell your friend that I'm not her lunch?" You asked her. Sukuna looks at her friend with a frown.

"Seija, I just work very hard making dinner for both of us. As an inchling, you know this not as easy as you think."

"But I haven't got any human prey in a while. Just let me-"

"Seija..." Sukuna looks at her with a serious expression; you're not sure if she's trying to save your skin or she really wants Seija to eat the food she made for her.

Defeated, Seija pouts and throws you into a small box in a table; you can tell she did this on purpose so that the next time she's finished, she'll come for you next.

As the two left the room, you make your plan to escape. Sadly, you don't know how to get back to your world, but at least you can leave this place before Seija gets back.

This box is covered in velvet so this is not going to be easy. You latch onto the soft wall and make your way up. You definitely predicted this as you were constantly falling off, but you went on to fight for your life.

This took alot of time than you expected, but you managed to get on top of the edge.

What happens next?
11511.title: The Inchling Savior

choices: She just wants you for herself
115112.content:
Your eyes widen as you saw a shadow pass by the door and thought that Seija is coming to get you. However, you then realized that the shadow is too small for someone like her to make which gives you the fact that is really belonged to Sukuna riding inside her floating pot.

"Are you here, human?" You hear her said. This is your chance; she really is trying to help you. You wave your hand frantically and shouted "I'm down here!" Luckily, you got her attention and she flew to your location.

From your view, she looks about 40 feet tall compared to your size, making you the size of a doll to her; just like comparing her own size with Seija's. Sukuna smiles and lowered her hand next to you. "Hop onto my hand, I'll help you climb out." She said. You did just that and she brings you up to her face; just looking at her is making you anxious about your own size.

"Are you okay? I hope Seija didn't hurt you." She said which made you relieved that she isn't as cruel as her friend.

"I'm okay, thank you for saving me." You said.

What happens next?
115112.title: Your "Little" Rescuer

choices: Near a large foggy lake (Misty Lake)
1153.content: Where are you at the moment?
1153.title: Somewhere else

choices: A young girl flying above the lake (Cirno)
A young girl sitting on the edge (Daiyousei)
A fish tail resting by the lake (Wakasagihime)
11531.content:
After getting sucked by that weird portal, you landed on a grassy ground. You got up from the ground and rubbed your eyes open but when you did, everything is not what you thought it would be.

The most noticeable thing you saw was the surroundings of tall grass strands. They are very tall and also wide; you knew what is going on. You realized that you are shrunken down to the size of an insect (probably smaller too) and are stranded in an unknown world.

You look beyond the tall grass, but only to see nothing but mist ahead. Even though it was hard to see, you can still make out that it is a vast lake that is covered in mist. Not only that, you can also see something within the fog.

What did you see?
11531.title: The Lake Of Mystery

choices: You toy with the fish tail
Suddenly, you see something coming out of the water
115313.content:
Looking real close, you can see what looks like a fish tail of some sort. It appears to be resting by the lake, but you have no idea why a fish is out of the water like that. With a curious mindset, you decided to go out there and take a closer look.

As you got closer, you can make it out more clearly and once you got there, you finally made it out both the color and shape of it.

It was bluish in color and it looked rather large for a fish, even at normal-size. The fins you saw are at the tip of the tail and you haven't seen any other fins on it. The strange thing is that the head and the rest of the body is submerged underwater, but the tail is still peaking out. This really puzzled you alot to be honest.

You could go and try to see what it was, but it seemed to dangerous to approach water at this size. So the only thing left to do is to check out the tail.

You walk towards the tail and stare at it a bit. It's pretty still and motionless, not moving for a bit. Occasionally, you can see it shift a little from time to time. You decided to be a little risky and poke the fish tail. It felt sleekly and smooth, and even a bit squishy. That's not all though, it reacted to your touch by slightly wiggling side to side before being still again.

You were still curious on this mysterious creature you found. Maybe you can take a risk and find out what it looks like. You could go and take a peek underwater. However, your eyes are still glued to it's tail. You couldn't help but feel like taking an even closer look on it; you even feel the need to have some bit of fun with it. You know this is going to be kinda dangerous, but you really have a weird fondness for squishy things to play with.

What happens next?
115313.title: A Fishy Tale

115332.content:
"Wakey wakey little one."

You have been woken up by a feminine voice from above along with getting shaken by an unseen force. The ground below you felt soft and even fleshy, but why is that?

"It's time to wake up, my little human"

There's that voice again and you suddenly felt someone slightly poking you on your side. Finally, you open your eyes....only to be greeted by an unexpected surprised.

"Ah, you are now awake." High above, you see a giant face of a woman with long blond hair and wearing a white dress staring down at you; her yellow eyes focused on you. You discovered that you are now standing on her giant hand and realized that you have been shrunk!

"What just happened? Why I'm I so small?" You asked her.

"I'm terribly sorry for not introducing myself like that. My name is Yukari Yakumo and as you can see, I have brought and shrunk you here in Gensokyo." She said.

"Brought me here? What do you mean by that?" You asked Yukari.

"Why for keeping you of course." She said smiling. WHAT?!

What the hell is this? She just shrunk you and pulled you here?! "This is outrageous!" You protested "This is kidnapping! You can't keep me like this."

"Awww why not? I always wanted to have a human around here." Yukari giggled. "Don't worry, you'll be taken good care here."

"I don't care, take me back home now!" Already, you don't want to end up being held captive to this crazy woman, you just wanted to get back to your world.

"But we haven't started yet." Said Yukari. "I mean, this is only your first day here." You really starting to get frustrated right now, but you realized that it's futile to get some sense into her so you decided to ask on why she wanted you.

"Why is it that you wanted me anyways?" You asked.

"Because~" She said.

"Well..."

What does she want with you?
115332.title: Yukari's Catch

1153323.content:
“You’ll become Chen’s shikigami!” Yukari spoke with smile.

“Who the heck is Chen? What do you mean by ‘shikigami’?” You spoke in little fear.

“You see, in simple way you would become one of my servants servant. That is what shikigami is.” Yukari said, then she turned to other direction “oh Chen! Please come here!”

You then saw a brown haired cat girl in red/black outfit and a green hat on and a two tails on her. She smiled and came to her.

“Do you need me lady Yukari?...ooh, what’s that?” The girl spoke.

“Chen, this young man is going become your shikigami now. You should be happy now.” Yukari said.

“Yay! Now I have my own shikigami!” This ‘Chen’ girl spoke cheerfully.

“No! I want to go home!! Put me back!!” You pleaded.

Yukari said...
1153323.title: Cat girls shikigami

choices: Puts on her shoulder, giving you a tour (gentle)
Play with you in her mouth (semi gentle)
Order you to be a mouse (evil)
11533232.content:
“What? Heck no! Why should I do that!?”

You shivered by what yukari said and she handed you over to the cat girl. Chen smiled as the circle were made, yukari spoke few words and once it was done, you felt some sort of warmth in your body and felt something from your ears. You felt your ears and it was pointy.

“Ah, so you became an elf, young man. Congratulations.” Yukari said.

“Change me back now!” You said little angerly.

“Sorry, once I finish my sentence, it’s final.” Yukari said, “now Chen, don’t be naughty with your shikigami.”

With that, she got into her gap and closed it, going away from you two. You feared what she’ll do as Chen thought for moment, she’ll...
11533232.title: Chen’s new servant

115333.content: Here are some genetic ones.
115333.title: Others

11533332.content: How about on top of pink eye ball( satori Komeiji)
11533332.title: Satori maiden

115333321.content:
You regain your consciousness after getting sucked by that strange portal you found in the bushes. After following an event like that, you are obviously not in the street anymore. Instead, you appeared to be in a bedroom of some kind that is so huge, it made you feel like an insect. Aside from it's sheer size, it was also has a rather old European feel to it with lavender-colored walls and a checkered floor; it also has some classic furnitures. Looking around, it made this place feel like you are in a castle or a palace. However, you didn't even noticed what you are standing on until you finally look at your feet when you are confused on why the floor felt so squishy.

You were somehow on top of red roundish thingy. It almost look like a giant...eyeball? Something's not right here. You gaze pass the giant thing until you can make out a bed with something huge on top of it. What is this?

You wondered where you were standing on until the ground shook. "What the heck is happening?" You said until you found out that the giant ball begans to rise up into a 90 degree; in fact the whole ground as well! You didn't have enough time to save yourself so you ended up slipping off and fall onto the ground.

As you were about to fall down to centain doom, something quickly picked you up. You were then lifted up into the air and came face to face with a giant face. You didn't know what just happened until you finally know the truth.

This bedroom isn't huge, you really are an insect here as you saw the gigantic bed beneath where this giant was sleeping on and of course, the giant itself. You make the identity of this giant and saw that it is a short pink-haired female with red eyeball thing (the same one that you were standing on moments ago) on her chest area. She wears a blue shirt with pink frills and yellow heart-shaped buttons, and a pinkish skirt.

"Who are you and how did you get here?" She asked.

(What the heck!? Who is this person!?) You wondered. You were pretty scared as she doesn't look pleased at seeing a stranger in her room. Just by looking at that red eye is already giving you the creeps as it was also staring back at you; this is definitely not a normal giant.

“You just wondered who I am.” She spoke. “I’m Satori Komeiji, head of this Chireiden mansion.” Wait...did she just read your thoughts?

“What the...you know what I thought?” You asked.

“Why yes. I have the ability to read others mind. As you are also wondering, my third eye can see what you are thinking.” Satori replied. Despite her unusual appearance, she doesn't sound too- “To be honest, it is little rude for you to invade my mansion. I don't take kindly to intruders like yourself.” It sounds like she readed your mind again.

“I’m so sorry! I didn’t meant to do it!” You begged for her forgiveness. You don't want to end up at the mercy of this woman.

She is...
115333321.title: Satorin fever

choices: Girl with cat ears came in! (Kaenbyo rin)
Girl with reddish eye on her chest came in! (Reiuji Utsuho)
Girl with light green hair cake in (Komeiji Koishi)
1153333211.content:
“Alright, I’ll forgive you.” Satori said. You breathe a sight of relief upon knowing she has spared your life.

“Thank you Ms Komeiji!” You replied.

“Please, just call me Satori if you want.” She said with smile. "I also read from within your mind that you have been shrunken down and thrown into Gensokyo by a portal." Gensokyo? Is this where you are right now?

"Why yes, it's a vast world that is inhabited by creatures known as Yokais, but they existed humans as well. Normally it's invisible from the eyes of those in the outside world and only certain methods can be used to enter." She explained "So it seems that you are currently in need of shelter so therefore, you'll be staying with me for now."

"Okay, I guess that's good." You said, agreeing with the fact that you wouldn't be able to survive on your own in an unknown world.

She then picked you up and puts you on her shoulder. "Would you like for me to show you around?" Satori asked.

Oh yes, please." You answered as she shows you around her home.

She gave you a tour to many different rooms such as the parlor, the kitchen, the bathroom, and when she shows you to the balcony, you notice that the sky looks kinda dark.

"This is because we are under the surface of Gensokyo so it always get dark here, even by day." She explained who once again, read your thoughts; you decided not to ask any question from your head.

Later on, she then shows you to another bedroom. The bedroom looked like it belonged to a young child with some toys spread around it and child-like drawings on the walls. Despite how it looks, it felt like it was cold and little lonely, letting you wonder why it was this way.

“Say satori, do you have brother or sister?” You asked.

“Well, I have a little sister name Koishi. She have an ability to manipulate unconsciousness.” Satori answers your question, “She haven’t been here for while.” You noticed her face slowly change to a frown, looking sad.

“Don’t you feel lonely?” You asked her. While you can't read minds like Satori, you can tell that she is deeply sadden by your question.

“Of course! Why wouldn’t I miss her!? I haven’t seen her for 6 months!” Satori replied.

It broke your heart as if you had brother or sister and didn’t see them for 6 months you would be sad as well. You noticed her now anguished face and got up, came to her, and petted her cheek.

“Let’s just pray she’ll be back soon satori.” You replied while trying to comfort her.

She noticed you as her tears came down and closed her eyes, petting your head with her finger.

“Thank you, for cheering me up.” Satori replied.

“No problem.” You said, you're glad that you are able to make Satori happy.

Just then...
1153333211.title: Nice satori giantess

11533332111.content:
“Lady satori! Look how much I caught today!!” You suddenly heard a voice which is followed by a cart excursing across the floor.

Both you and satori noticed a girl with long red hair that is tied in braids by black ribbons and wears a black/green dress and a pair of black shoes. You then realized that she also doesn't look human as you noticed two tails coming from behind her and cat ears on her head. You suddenly smelled the bad odor from the pushcart and after looking what's inside it, you discovered it has a lot of corpses in it!

“Um..yes iron. You have gotten plenty today.” Satori replied.

“Yes I have!” The catgirl said with smile, then noticed you. “Hey, who’s he?” You hide from her sight, fearing that she'll eat you since cats have a natural instinct of hunting down small creatures.

“Oh, he’s our guest." Satori said. She then whispers to you. "It's okay, she won't eat you; just tell her your name." She read your thoughts again.

“Sid.” You replied, coming into her view “Sid tenancy.”

“Alright, Mr.tenancy, she’s Rin Kaenbyo, one of my pet I have.” Satori replied. "As you can see, she's tasked to collect corpses and materials for the blazing fires of hell." You're not going to go further into that at the moment.

“Nice to know you Mr.Tenancy.” Rin replied with smile, “Just call me Orin if you want to, ok?”

“S-sure?” You replied. Although Orin seemed to be safe around, you are still quite nervous around her.

"By the way, how did you got here in Gensokyo? And why are you so small?" Rin asked you.

"Umm..I don't know how I got so small." You answered. "All I know that I got here from a portal I found in the bushes."

"I see, well you should be careful around here as this place is full of youkai. They're mythical creatures that dwells around here.” Orin said. “Some are nice, but a lot of are bad folks.” You shivered at the thought of being eaten by a monstrous yokai.

“Don’t worry, as long as your here, you’ll be safe.” Satori said, “If you need to go out, I’ll ask Orin to help you go out.” You felt relieved.

"I could do that, but I'm busy with the corpses here; see you Satori." Said Rin as she left the scene

After that...
11533332111.title: enter cat girl

115333322.content: How about the touhou from pc 98 era (Japanese pc only from early 90’s)
115333322.title: Old pc game

choices: Next to a large Japanese architecture (The Hakurei shine)
In the middle of a humongus forest (Forest Of Magic)
On a endless hallway (Scarlet Devil Mansion)
12.content:
"Ugghh...my head" you groaned after you woken up and got up from a long state of unconsciousness. You remembered that you were walking down the street when suddenly, you come across a odd portal in the bushes. The portal was purple with creepy eyes inside and red ribbons on each side. After curiously approaching it, you were suddenly sucked in quickly and soon, you blacked out.

The real question remains, where are you right now?
12.title: A Different World

choices: On a brown surface with a wide purple arch above you (on Seija Kijin's sandal)
On a red surface that curves outwards all around you (in Hoshiguma's sake dish)
125.content: You finally wake up after blacking out and you try to look around at your new location. At first it's difficult since you are regaining your sight but after a few seconds you are able to see. But you don't know where you are and you see you are located...
125.title: Other places

choices: Near a large foggy lake (Misty Lake)
1253.content: Where are you at the moment?
1253.title: Somewhere else

125333.content: Here are some genetic ones.
125333.title: Others

choices: Try to get away from the bug girl.
Suddenly, one of the fireflies scoops you up!
1253331.content:
The pounding pain in your head quickly subsides as soon as you heard the loud noise of buzzing. Lot of buzzing! Having PTSD flashbacks of that one time you inadvertently found a very hyperactive africanized honey bee nest, you quickly curl up into a ball and hope it'll be quick cuz you cant outrun those bastards!

Thankfully, you suffered no stings. That loud buzzing wasnt even from bees. They were actually fireflies. It was pitch black in the middle of this wide open field that seemed to go on for miles with only the majestic glow from the swarms of fireflies to light the area.

It was mesmerizing watching the tiny little nights dance about illuminating the darkness like the super bright lit up signs all over Las Vegas. All it needed was some catchy upbeat music to play in the background and you could watch this spectacle all night,

That is until one of those hundreds and hundreds of fireflies stopped in the middle of their flying and landed just near you! It was then you learned that you were shrunk.

The firefly was huge. HUGE! Like as big a horse! Big and freakishly ugly like most insects at close range! You gazed in horror hopefully outside of it's sight (though you couldnt tell cuz it's thousands of optical orbs were looking all directions!) as it stopped to groom it's antennae. As much as you wanted to question where you are and what happened to your size, that was currently on the backburner as your primary focus was trying to avoid being detected by ANY of these giant fireflies, let alone the one just in front of you! You had no idea they if were carnivorous and you did not wanna take any chances (and if you DID know, you'd be even MORE terrified!)

However that huge firefly quickly became the least of your problems as well! Because you were distracted by the bug, you didnt see the even more colossal figure fly toward you until a very large shoe landed on the grass near where youre standing! The big firefly quickly flew away, not so much out of fear, but out of convenience for the titanic figure now in view!

Before you stood a humongous green-haired girl in a white shirt, blue bloomers, and a black cape (with a red interior). You wouldnt have thought of her THAT out of the ordinary if you didnt notice the antennae sticking out of her green hair! And they werent for show either. They twitched! And after they twitched, you watched with utmost attention while the fireflies buzzed circles around her, again you were unable to avert your eyes from the glow. Especially from her!

Literally, she was glowing! You gazed with disbelief and an awful bit of intrigued as her hips shined a bright light in the same flashing pattern as the fireflies surrounding her. Shamed to say it took a little more effort than it should of to snap you out of it! This colossal girl you were glancing up at was a bonna fide bug girl! Not a girl who was fascinated with bugs, but a girl who actually WAS a bug!

Fascinating discovery if you werent the size of an ACTUAL bug! Priorities, man. You were in need of desperate help and you desperately wanted help desperately! Your first thought would be the get the giant bug girl's attention.
But then the second reminded you that she was a bug girl. Not a human girl. BUG GIRL. To other creatures, you were no longer at the top of the foodchain and since you were already worried about being firefly food, you oughta most certainly be worried about being bug girl food too!

To be fair, she doesnt seem to be FERAL bug girl what with wearing such humanish clothes and such, so maybe talking her into helping you wouldnt be THAT unreasonable, right?
1253331.title: Dance of the Fireflies

12533313.content:
However, you are a little too late for decisions as a firefly comes flying downwards and towards your direction! It flew so quickly that even your reflexes couldn't pull off in time. Just like that, the bug grabs you by it's front legs and carries you into the air.

"No, put me down!" You protested. You have no idea what this creature wants to do you. By the looks of it, the firefly appears to be bringing you to the giant girl because it was flying right towards her face. You realized that these bugs act like some sort of servants to her, almost like their queen. Maybe it's trying to have you shown and examined by her due to being such a strange "bug". Finally, you are now looking at this bizarre young giantess' face that is now in front of you.

"Huh? What's that you are holding there, Miss Natsume?" asked the girl. Being so up close, you were slightly blown by her breath and it only got more intimating when she set her huge blue eyes on you, trying to see what her firefly friend has.

You felt absolutely terrified by this point. One is that you are being held up from hundreds of feet in the air, two is that are now at the mercy of this girl, and third you have no idea what is going to happen if she spots you.

You don't need to wait because you can see her huge pupils now staring right at you.

"What is this? Is this a person?" She said and lowers her hand from below you. Miss Natsume then drops you onto her hand and then the girl brings you to her face.

What happens next?
12533313.title: Bug Catched

12533332.content: How about on top of pink eye ball (Satori Komeiji)?
12533332.title: Satori Maiden

info.brief_description: You found yourself in the realm of Gensokyo only to find it a lot bigger than you imagine.
info.description:
You get sucked into Gensokyo from the Touhou Project series at a very tiny size. Will you survive or will you end up getting yourself killed? Only one way to find out!

Rules:

1. Try to put more effort when writing a chapter and make sure it's a paragraph.

2. Use decent grammar.

3. Any fetish is allowed, but make sure they don't distant themselves from the main story.

4. The character is tiny enough to be unnoticed; however awareness is also allowed but try to get out details on how he/she get noticed.

5. The character can have any sort of personality.

6. You can end the story but don't try to do it so very soon.

7. Death is allowed but put some effort on it.

8. All the Touhou character's personalities are the same like they are (or at least how the majority the fandom often portrayed them) in the games. Don't go out of character unless there's a reason behind the changes.

9.The character is not some random fan, gamer, or anything like that. So he/she has no single knowledge about the Touhou series.

10. Have fun!!!!



06/21/2019 UPDATE:

As of this time, the story's rating has now jumped from 13+ to 18+ giving everyone the freedom to write whatever fits their style whatever they want. Any chapters with violent, sexual or other contents that are common in older rated stories are accepted without consequences.

However, there's still a few limits that you must follow. Just because you can write whatever you want does not mean there's no rules.

New Rules:

1. No extreme sexual content with underage characters.

It's so damn obvious why stuff like this should never be in the story. I don't want to see a story involving NSFW material with young characters because it's seriously messed up. So please don't go too far with this sort of stuff with the chapter involve around them.

2. No rebirthing.

I can still tolerate Insertion stuff....even if that's not my cup of tea. However, I can't really make sense with rebirthing stuff (I mean how can't you be turn into a newborn just by going inside reproductive organs) so I'm afraid this sort of stuff aren't allowed. My apologizes to all you fans out there.

3. Toilet stuff

While I'm fine with some bodily functions like sweat, boogers, and so on. However, I'm not okay with pooping, peeing and other stuff that is commonly seen on the toilet. Seriously, I'm terribly grossed out by this sort of stuff. Of course, that doesn't mean everyone can't do their business as long it happens off-screen.


So there you have it guys, go extra nuts and write what's ever in your mind ;)
